name: Visitors: First Contact Demo
description:
A retro Sci-Fi First Person/Third Person shooter game that focuses on the battle between the 21st century humans and the first ever alien race visiting Earth. The player will battle the alien race and their monster creations over the course of several missions in a single-player campaign mode.

The game, in its current stage as a Single-Player, is about recapturing points and locations on Earth occupied by the Alien forces. 

You are given objectives that you must accomplish to finish each mission.

In each mission you can fight the alien forces and their monsters, on foot, on the ground, in the air, and in space.

The game can be played in first person or third person view.

There are also various weapons available to the player in each mission.

The gameplay is similar to Star Wars Battlefront 2004/2005 and Star Wars: Rogue Squadron on N64.

The game's still in Early Access, but most of the features are already implemented.

This demo showcases many of the features mentioned above.

NOTE: For best Graphics choose "Autodetect" in the Video options. Or set everything to High if you have a decent computer. Also, Anisotropic Filtering should be either 4x, 8x, or 16x (recommended.)

Controls can be seen in Options->Input and press "Show" for Player or Aerial Vehicles.

If you like the game, please mention it or share it with others.

Comments, suggestions are welcome. :)
